thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 27 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Gecina Has Been Notified Ivanhoé Cambridge's Sale Of Part Of Its Interest In Group's Equity

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Gecina Has Been Notified Ivanhoé Cambridge's Sale Of Part Of Its Interest In Group's Equity

organizations.name: brief-gecina has been notified ivanhoé cambridge

text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - GECINA SA:
* HAS BEEN NOTIFIED IVANHOÉ CAMBRIDGE‘S SALE OF PART OF ITS INTEREST IN GROUP‘S EQUITY THROUGH A PLACEMENT
* PLACEMENT CONCERNED 3.2 MILLION GECINA SHARES, REPRESENTING 4.28% OF ITS EQUITY
* IVANHOÉ CAMBRIDGE‘S REMAINING INTEREST THEREFORE REPRESENTS 15.4% OF CAPITAL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
